channel.title: developer on Hecklers in Development
channel.description: Recent content in developer on Hecklers in Development

item.title: Three Things About Me
item.description: I was contacted recently for a Java magazine profile. I was incredibly honored to be asked, as you might imagine! But it got me thinking…​interviews and conversations are short, and to be frank, I think we could all understand and empathize with each other better if we’d just share a little more of ourselves. All of us. And since I wouldn’t expect of anyone else what I wouldn’t be willing to do, I figured it only fair to start the ball rolling.

item.title: Building a Developer Workstation
item.description: I recently got a (very nice!) new 2018 MacBook Pro (MBP) with 32G of RAM & a 550GB SSD. It’s fast & sleek, and you could hardly wish for more in a traveling developer’s machine than it provides. Other than a few speedbumps I hit with migration from my old MBP (interesting to resolve but minor on balance) and upgrading MacOS to Mojave (Sentinel’s fault, not Apple’s), I love this machine!
